data.text: It was great! So much fun, and so satisfying. I would love to give this a five star, but unfortunately there were a couple bugs I found. Often when there would be an add, it would freeze and go dark. The only way it would unfreeze was when I swiped out of the app, that made me lose all my progress on the map I was just on. It also wouldn't give me the percent that I had gotten before it froze. Its not too big of a deal, but that was why it couldn't be a five star.

Don't believe anyone else's reviews. I DELETED this game after just an hour playing it. The Insane amount of ADs on this game ruins it. When an ad appears every 30 seconds and gives you a "No Thank You" option, but when you click it, it just sends you to another ad... So what's the purpose of it. So unless you pay for No ADs, this game is unbearable. It's nothing like the website!

This game Would be fun if it wasn't for the "Break time" ads in the middle of a game. I swear, they give you like 2 of these things right when I'm trying not to get my trail get cut off by another player which I think are bots. I die usually after these things and they could definitely give me as many ads they want after a round of me trying to win. Please fix this as it is very very annoying. Thank you

It's a good game it just has a lot of ads. For example, when I start a new place on a map and I get at least 3 kills, it plays an ad. Also, it gets kind of boring when you get all the skins except legendary ones (the ones you have to use real money for ), and they don't really ad in new ones like I think the game would be a little bit better if they had a bigger choice of skins for this game.

Far too many ads, the ads itself just doesn't make any sense. I'm not saying a game shouldn't have them but these ads just feel forceful. As soon as you kill three players you're hit with an ad about some power up, it doesn't even matter if you decline it or not either. The game itself is fun! (Cool updates!) but the ads just ruin everything for it. I'd prefer the older version of this game, at least they didn't shove ads down your throat

Ridiculous. The game was really fun, I was doing really well, as well as getting rewards. I covered 80% of the map and got my reward since it was my first time covering that amount. I covered 100% and I was so excited. I then got an ad. I watched it, clicked the x to get off the app, and the game closed! I wasn't panicked so I went back on it because I assumed I'd still be on the app. But no. Nothing saved. This is so annoying. Game was fun before this happened.

The game is always so glitchy. It's really good 1/3 of the time. The other 2/3 is so chaotic its always laggy, and they spawn people, so I can die easily n watch ads. One time, they even made the 'extra life' button really tiny to the point where I couldn't click it, so I could watch an ad. Anyway, the game is fun and addicting but the makes of this game need to be fixed this right now. Also, when you die and you want to play again, you have to watch an AD, and when you do, it always frozen.

Edit: It's gotten even WORSE! So many ads every few seconds, and these weird power ups are not fun. Just keep the game normal but less ads every second. Play a 2 mins ad after you die that's fine but mid game is annoying. I use to love this game but now there are ads right in the middle of playing! It's annoying. Uninstalled. Addictive but glitchy! Seems to spaz out only when I'm doing really well... It's fun though!

The game is only fun 1/4 of the time, the other 3/4 of the game, it's laggy, unfun and ad filled. This game is practically an ad fever, as there's just too many, and if we are gonna have ads, at least make them stable because this is the 7th time I've gotten kicked out of the game by an ad. And it also won't save my progress either, which is why I'm probably gonna uninstall this game. This game needs to get its ad problem fixed or smth.

I like the game a lot. It's an ad farm, but it's voodoo so of course it is. My big issues are both on level select. once you've gotten an area covered it'll pick 3 more for you to choose from. It tells me a continent is unlocked but I can't finish the continent I'm on, or ever get back to it. My other issue is frequently the shop and everything will disappear. I can restart the app, restart the phone whatever, but if I wanna change my skin or spend any coins, that's just a shame.

This could easily be a 4-4.5 star game. Been playing for a couple months now. Initially I was gonna give it a 4 star review. But I waited, and glad I did. There's an ad before you do anything. Multiple forced ads WHILE playing a match. An ad after you finish your match. Then repeats. Also an add for anything extra offered to you. Aside from the ads, the game is very basic, easy to learn, and fun to progress. Has many different stamps to collect. And is definitely NOT pay to win. But the ads suck

I love the idea but the ads KILL me. There's an ad after every game and when it gives you "break time" you can't avoid the ad even if you select "Tap to Continue". Sometimes if you revive with an ad it freezes and doesn't save. Otherwise it's an alright game. The idea of filling up actual countries is cool. Install if you don't mind the constant ads.

This game is fun and casual but one thing... the advertisements are ridiculous. When it's on break time, it offers us something like eagle eyes for ad,and I press tap to continue for no ad, it still gives me an ad. I am getting tired of all of the ads every 10-30 seconds. I would just delete the game and not download it again or I would just let it sit there. This is so ridiculous!

Yeah it's a cool fun little game to play to pass time but there are so many ads. I personally don't mind the ads so much but when they pop up mid game and cause the game to crash/freeze on a blank screen it gets so annoying. I can't save anything and have to lose all progress on an area and start again. The skins are okay, I like the little detail on the crab one, it's pretty cool but the ads and constant crashing are an issue that really brings the game down and makes it worth less imo

One reason is that I was at 78% then oh y'all make my game freeze so all my work was for nothing how useless and also me having black screens during ads and here is a funny one when I get yose power block I click no thanks and guess what it gives me one anyway like why when you have two options yet they both have ads and some ads take forever to load and I can't leave without leaving the app!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!😡😡🤬🤬🤬😤

I like the game but, like everyone else is saying, there are WAY WAY WAY to many ads. Ad every 10 second in-game, ad every time you die, ad ad AD. Hey, this is me, a few years later, I tried it again and still TOO. MANY. ADS. sometimes it gives you an ad and it sends you to the app store and when you co,e back to the game you start over. It gives you an ad every two minutes. I understand needing ads to make money, but this is too far.

Lots and lots and lots of ads, but fun! I rate it a 4 because I keep winning, but WAY too many ads But I really do recommend you try this out! Once you win, you go to a whole new place every single time. So what are you waiting for? But wait! I wanna warn you! There are a lot of people, and they could get you! I also wanna say that, if you were thinking it was the one with the skins and stuff on the side, then you know, it isn't that, sadly. I also don't know which that one is. So try it out!

Love the game, but has way to many adds. The game is very addicting and enjoyable, but it's the adds that make it bad. Every time there is a power up or break time and you click continue it just shows another add. If there were less adds I would rate it five stars. Luckily I did find a way to not watch the adds. If someone is reading this then whenever an add pops up just exit the game and go back in. Then you don't have to watch it. But I'm rating this three stars because of all the adds.

Really good game but you cant even play the game. While playing an active game it forces you to take a "break time" and even if you dont accept the power up, it forces you into an ad. Had a lot of potential, but after being forced to stop to watch ads midgame several times in a single match, it forced me to uninstall. Honestly, not even worth the time spent downloading.

Used to love this app. Then on an update it wouldn't open anymore. So when I uninstalled it and then reinstalled, I lost all my progress and my purchase of making it add free. Update: 1/28/24 I have this game a second chance. Now when you die it gives you the chance to watch an ad for an extra life. More often than not, the whole ad plays, but then the game is locked up and you lose any current progress. Stay away. There are too many other games out there.

I genuinely am so sad. This is a good game, great game even, but the ads are ridiculous. You cannot play the game for a minute before you get a 10-30 second ad. It is almost impossible to play with the amount of ads- they give you an illusion of choice during break time but still play an add when you click "continue". On the tiktok ad, it said "NO WIFI GAME" in the caption. In all caps. And it still requires wifi.

I can't say it's good in the slightest due to the overabundance of ads. I mean, every 3 kills, you get an ad, and on top of that, if you die, you also get an ad. Also, if you say yes to a power up when it is giving you an ad break, if it gives you a skippable ad and you choose to still click off and not get your "reward", it just takes you back to the same screen and will make you watch ANOTHER AD. So yeah, this is probably the most ads I've ever dealt with in a game. I mean, it is by voodoo 🤷

The game is good if you can actually enjoy it. I'm not kidding when i say there's an ad time not only between when you die which I kind of understand, but even if you don't die they throw you an ad every 2 to 3 minutes. You can literally get an ad, die, get another ad, and by the time you finished the 2 ads it's time for the other ad, so 3 in a row depending on what happens. That's ridiculous, I just had to unistall.

This game would be fun, IF it didn't have an EXUBERANT amount of ads. It's absolutely insane. There is an ad after ever single game. Even if I literally lose immediately upon entering the game, there's an ad. Sometimes there are even ads in the middle of game play and they call it a "break". I would pay for no ads and keep the game if they were so greedy. However, I have to uninstall this game out of principle.

Never ever ever download this game. There are so many ads it is unbelievable. It is not only ads per death and per log in but there's also ads while you play on a map. It will legit stop in the middle of a playthrough and take a "break" which is just a ad break. It is horrible. You can't enjoy even a simple game like this. Horrible company for doing this. They do it all the time

Too many ads. I would give it zero Stars if I could. Like I get that the creators need to make money but it's all the time, after literally everything you do. And plus it's not a real online game! It just pauses in the middle of the round and then goes back to nothing happened. that's not how online games work. It's also very glitchy and you die for no reason sometimes.

I've been playing for months, even got the ad free version bc I've been so addicted. I had to deal with ads that would make me lose progress and cause me to restart the game and spending coins on the extra lives didn't actually give you help. I finally get to 140/148 countries filled, I fill in 141. Then 142. Then it reset me back to 138. This happened eight more times to my heavy frustration. I put money into the game to complete it and my well earned reward has been stolen from my sad hands.

It's a great game, but there's SO many ads. It stops in the middle of you playing to watch an ad, and it's like every 1:30. and when it's break time you can choose a cheat thing like, zone defense and you have to watch an ad for it, but I you choose not to get the thing you still have to watch an ad anyways. and idk if it's just me but if you choose to watch an ad for an extra life after you die my game just freezes and doesn't do anything. it's a good game just less ads and fix gliches please.

Would you like a 30-second advertisement?Me: no, i would not. Game: You got it. Here is your in-game 30-second ad that you asked for that will almost certainly cause you to lose. Terrible. In-game ads when the game does not pause after forced ads literally every minute. If ad-pushing games are the best you can do, then get out of software engineering. Trash. Update: when certain ads launch, it is launching chrome and displaying a spammy looking page without me having touched the ad.

Whenever I die I get the chance to watch an ad and whenever I do the game freezes and I lose my progress of that game and when I play red vs blue whenever I click the add to get +3 trophies sometimes I don't get it. The game is fun but these bugs just make it worse. Also you should have to the option to say no when you reach a certain amount kill they give you a power up and it doesn't give the option to say no. If bugs don't annoy you this game is for you. Without bugs this game is fun anyway

it has been a few months playing this trash of a game, and the same bug keeps happening. this game, it is absolutely horrible. If you like trashy games that glitch out every second, give an ad every 5 seconds, once you watch an ad to get a power up or revive, IT WILL GLITCH OUT THEN I HAVE TO REDO THE WHOLE WORLD! DO NOT RECOMMEND. this game is bad. Very very bad. Do not play.

99% ads, 1% game. The ads are so out of hand that it freezes the game frequently and makes the actual game experience lack luster. Then asking for the "discounted" price of $9.99 for no ads, that's just too much for a game that is sub par. If they got rid of most of the ads, it would be worth it and more enjoyable.

Too many ads.. bro why I gotta kill three people in order to get a break but ads pop up. I get the whole "watch ad to gain this power" during the break but if I simply decline, don't give me an ad after that.. maybe when I die give me an ad. But there's too many.. and to pay so much just to remove ads for this game is crazy. I liked the game but no.. the ad pop ups are too much in my opinion. Others opinions might differ from mine but these games gotta stop with the obsessive ads.

At first this game was cool but after a while it has many issues discovered. The game is fun but to get skins you have complete 50 percent of the map or more. Then there are alot of ads after a game match there are ads and even in the game its a break time and we dont even have the option to choose break time or to skip. Overall it does have challenges like red vs blue which is pretty fun to play. Yet there are boring challenges like collect the most pineapples or who can win the highest coins.

The amount of ads is ridiculous and it wouldnt be a problem if they weren't so long I spent most of the time watching ads than playing cause it's so easy to die and what's so annoying is you can choose to watch an ad for an extra life but I I choose to start over and it still gives you an ad like why? This game would be really cool but the amount of ads is definitely a deal breaker

I loved this game years ago and decided to play again now. The amount of ads is too much. I watch ads for longer than actually playing the game. Just imagine, you get a 30 seconds ad every time you kill 3 players. I tried to avoid killing others to get less ads, but some players just infiltrate your area in front of you and you can't even avoid killing them. And I thought this game was online, but apparently you play with dumb bots.(how would others wait for your ad???) And no ad option is $10!

Fun game but don't buy ad free it's a scam. I got it because the ad interpretation during the game was annoying, wasted $10 because now it just crashes consistently three different time while completing Alaska it crashed and I lose my progress. I want a refund but know that won't happen 😡 wish games like this had a well maintained paid version, ads have ruined mobile games

I played this game again. after 30 seconds of play time you forced an ad. this games isnt even playable with actual people. you play against bots. if thats so, then why do you disable the game when airplane mode is turned on. Are you that money hungry? i thinks its despicable. the constant ads interrupting the game play is so annoying that i uninstalled and downloaded a modded version thats ad free and completely unlocked. its very simple to do, and i plan on making a video showing how to do it

You literally can't win. The goal is to fill out the entire world, 148 countries. When you get to 138 they don't let you progress. You fill out your 139th country and suddenly out of nowhere 3 to 4 of the countries get "captured" by I'm presuming bots. I stop playing for 20min and no more countries are gone. The second I try to go over 138 again more countries get taken. It's to make you want to play for longer but has the opposite effect.

Very great game! I love the skins they give and how creative each skin are. the only problem is the adds. Playing the game I've noticed you get an "add break" every three k!lls. Which takes about 2 - 5 minutes to complete, if that. and after you die you get another add. It's sorta ridiculous but I understand you need to make money but come on! Other then that its a very creative, addictive game.

Too many ads. They'll pause your game and give you an option to watch an ad to get a boost or 'tap to continue'. You can hit 'tap to continue' if you don't care about the boost and because you don't want to watch an ad, but hitting 'tap to continue' will still kick start an ad. They are unavoidable and make the game unplayable

the games fun but there's just too many ads. every minute while your playing or if you get too many kills at a time you get put on break time where you have to watch an ad. if you die you have to watch an ad(every time without fail). the games fun but you can't enjoy it with the amount of ads. worst part is if you go offline you can't play the game. terrible game not worth it

The game is very bad. The ads make it actually unplayable. You have to watch ads every three kills you get and every time you die. The ads will just freeze, and then you have to back out of the game and get no credit for the match. The game itself is also very buggy and freezes which will also make you back out for no credit. This game could be very fun if they work out the bugs and take about 20 steps back on the forced ads. Saved up for the extra life just to not have any option of using it.

I could easily give this 5, in fact I could give it a 10. I understand you need ads for revenue, however, every 5-10 seconds is ridiculous, especially when half the time you end up getting killed because you can't control your "person" right before the break time ad comes up or your not in your "zone" and you get killed when you come back. The game definitely needs some tweaks, but I loved your original and I almost love this one.

Update: after being forced to watch an ad, the game will crash and I lose all my progress. It's sad because the game is so good but between the ads and now the crashes, it's sadly unplayable. Definitely agree with all the other reviews. The amount of ads is ridiculous, people aren't lying when there's ads every 30 sec or less. The game itself is worth 5 stars, but with so many ads, it's just not worth it to play. I don't mind paying for ad free, but not when it's pretty much forced on you.

Every time you watch an ad for a reward, you are forced to sit there for 30 seconds just for the game to freeze. So not only do you not recieve the reward, but you also lose all progress. Great concept for a game, but if the bugs are this extreme, it's not worth the play. Sadly a lot of things require you to watch a video - boosts, extra lives, etc. You can't actually get any of them. I paid $5 for no-ads, and I STILL have issues - don't buy it.

I really like this game but there's just too many ads and when I play an ad for an extra life, the screen will freeze after the ad finishes playing 9 times out of 10 and I have to restart the app which makes me lose all my progress. I finally saved up enough coins (50,000) to upgrade my lives to have an extra one which was just a waste of my coins because it doesn't do anything, I die and that's it, no extra life like it promises. Waste of my time.

This game crashes a lot. There's ads everywhere. If you die, ad. Home screen, ad. Power up, ad. Even if you don't die, you'll be mid game and gives you a little 5 second timer to "ad break" which usually crashes the game. Got the map 100% taken over? Great, you're reward is the game crashes and doesn't even get your % full and you have to do it again. You get so little time between ad breaks and the game crashes 70% of the time after an ad

The ads are ridiculous. Half the time, it causes the whole game to stop or crash. There are ads basically every 20-40 seconds, and sometimes they are incredibly long. Ontop of that once you almost complete the entire surface area, the game will kick you out. It's just all-around annoying. It could be a great game if there weren't so many ads.

Edit:Tried to come back, but the same issues remain. Ads should always give the player something in return. On top of that, the ads were usually deceptive. Went from 2 star to 1. Too many ads! Ads on the main menu. Ads after each death. See an ad to revive. Banner ad on the bottom of the game area. Each update seems to add more without improving the game.

Ads ruined the experience. Okay, so I'm usually not one to complain about ads on free games... however the ads on this completely ruined it. Every 15 seconds or so in game it brings up a pop-up "break-time" counts down from 5 you can either watch un unskippable 5 second ad or get a reward for around a 30 second ad. Skins/powers spawn on map, if you hit one. You get ad to receive it. I understood that one. Gets a bit ridiculous with the others though. If you die. Well you guessed it, ads.

Honestly, the game itself is fun. But it force-feeds ads down your throat every few seconds. It gets even worse if you get two or three kills quickly. It plays ads after every game. It plays ads during the game. There are even some ads that are just audio clips that play while you're still playing the game as if the other five ads you already watched weren't enough. I understand they need to monetize it somehow. But the amount of ads in this game is ridiculous and makes it borderline unplayable

Even after paying to take away the ads, the game is rigged to kill you as often as possible to entice you into watching ads for an extra life. Some ads work, others lead to the game freezing up and you having to close it and restart, thus loosing all progress you made before watching the ad. Game is also buggy as heck, and will kill you randomly, without reason.

The game is great, but I don't appreciate the advertisement method here. Clearly the goal is to annoy you in into paying to get rid of the ads. I would have paid to go add free, but I don't appreciate the manipulation. Also the ads constantly crash the app. Ads interrupt game play, and sometimes even other ads. I see this method being used more and more and the only way to stop it is to stop falling for the trick. We can do better!

I loved this game until today. The "break time" after you kill 3 people was always ridiculous, but today when I went to play the game, they'd implemented a new system where you can play for 60 seconds ad free and then when that times up, you can either give up or watch an ad for an extra 30 seconds of play time, then pay 30 gems for each additional amount of time. It is absolutely ridiculous, as if the incessant ads weren't already making this game near unplayable.

Fun game - if you could play it. The game starts off fine but after you play for a bit there slowly seeps in more and more ads. First the power ups, power ups you can't use unless you watch an ad, ads that occasionally crash the game and won't reward you for. If you choose not to use any power ups the game forces you to watch an ad for "break time" (still ads that will crash the game). On top of all this there's now 1minute timers to finish an entire round. L game don't download. Bad game. 0⭐️

Too many ads and the endgame is rigged to be impossible to complete. 145 total countries to conquer, once you hit 135 it promptly has two of them be "captured" by other "players" and forces you to redo them. Oh what's that you hit 136 again? Back down to 134, infinite loop. Doesn't matter how many shields you have, nothing. And even if you pay for the ads to be gone, you still have to watch ads if you want to get powerups. Oh and the "extra life" upgrade fully doesn't work at all. Horrific.

This game is awful . It is a nice concept BUT THE ADS DRIVE ME CRAZY there is ads after everytime you die, when you kill 3 people there is a "break time" with an ad, and there are audio ads in the middle of the game. When you die and want a extra life you watch and ad but some of those ads don't even give you an extra life! The amount of ads is unbearable! Would NOT recommend.

Love the game, but when I get an ad, it goes through the ad, and goes back to the screen that said "break time" or "bonus" or it goes to a black screen when I click on the ad. It makes me so upset💀. Other than that, the game is great, and super fun, so I recommend playing it!! I'm am rating this from my tablet but I usually play it on my phone. :)

It's a fun game don't get me wrong, but it crashes WAYYY to much, there's been countless of times where I almost complete a map n the screen will make an ad pop up and after it plays the screen will just go black and it'll close the app out, not to mention there's so many ads I get you need your money but damn! It doesn't need one every 4 minutes

UPDATE: Came back to this after 3 years,and while I like some of the changes (team play, little contests), it's still wonky at times. I do like that you can purchase upgrades (longer booster times, bigger starting space, and supposedly extra lives) I say supposedly because even though I've upgraded that twice, when I die I'm still expected to watch an ad to continue.

This game is fun,it really is but what really bothers me is that first of alll there is a thing called break time witch is super annoying and you have to watch a ad to get a cool ability but if you click off you still get an ad, second, when you want to get an extra life sometimes it doesn't work. Sometimes you can't even click out the ad! Lastly, to much ads, so if you like ads play this game

This is an addictive game, for sure. I paid for no ads because they were RELENTLESS (every 1-2 minutes, no exaggeration), but I still have to see ads! 😀 What's that about? They're definitely less frequent, but it still seems like false advertising to me. Also I don't understand the purpose of the shields. But this is a fun time waster for sure, and the game pieces are creative and diverse.

Kind of meh. Too many ads, can not bypass the ones for free things. More ads than play time honestly. Can't even figure out if this is a fun game, just keep getting the same ad over and over. Deleting it. Ads are overwhelming. Interupts mid round, causing you to lose a life after the ad. If you need an ad every 15 seconds, you're doing something wrong. Waste of time, don't download.

Honestly, I'm being generous with two stars, One, ADS! I get it, ad revenue. But one every ten seconds, and one every single time you finish or end a round is too many. Two, functions and bugs! What's with the break time? You snip 1-3 people and a timer goes off as break time and you have to watch an ad to get your progress back! It's such a waste! The beginning of this game was actually fun! You'd even play against real people! Not Ai bots. What happened @VOODOO ? Fix this, or nobody's playin'!

It's a fun time killer but can get boring after a bit. My main compliant is the constant ads mid game. You can watch an ad to get an extra life if you die but sometimes the game will freeze after the ad and you won't get the extra life. This is very annoying considering I had to watch an ad just to get nothing and have to restart the game.

Game is fun, playing it is unbearable, adverts every 30 seconds, some make the game crash and I have to reload. It's a good concept, but advertising other stuff every time I go into a round is ridiculous and charging 10 dollars to get rid of the annoyance is highway robbery. I've probably sat in an advert screen for more time than I've actually been playing the game at this point and I've had the app for less than 24 hours

It's a really fun and addicting game, but the thing I hate is when I get a power up. And when I try to watch the ad, my game just freezes or completely turns black. And then I have to restart the game and lose my progress. Plus, the game is a bit laggy. And I feel like i'm playing with bots though I think they should add a global chat and maybe voice chat. That could be fun. So the game is okay. Though it needs a few updates and changes And everything is just an ad button, which is just annoying

Even after PAYING for no ads, I still have to watch ads if I want to use any power ups, get a new skin, or a bunch of other things. Some ads (optional) are during the action of the game... you can get killed while watching those. Gems that you've earned are locked in a bank that you have to pay to use. It seems most of the other "players" are just weak bots which gets old quickly. Needs a lot of improvements, which is a shame because the premise is fun and unique.

Awful. First of all, every single couple of minutes, there's this "break time" unless you buy no ads. And if you click no thank you for the break time, it STILL GIVES YOU AN ADD. Second of all, after the first revive with ads, you have to pay for gems, which is not as good. And you can EASILY die on accident with one wrong step. And then in the middle of the match when it's just two people, more people can come in and steal all your progress. Please fix this, it's so dumb.

Could be fun, but isn't. Free game bombards you with ads and paid version still has ads for bonuses. Both will occasionally freeze the game after you watch the whole ad while not giving you the bonus. Also something terrible: you can pay 50000 coins for the /opportunity/ to watch another ad or pay 30 gems for an extra life. If I paid the 50000 coins and paid actual money for the full version of the game, why should I have to watch an ad to use an extra life, just to have the game freeze?

Game is different with a newer, fresher approach. The one thing that bugs me is the too often occurring "break times". I had like 6 or more break times on the same level. If a game is well developed and well received, the money you receive from all these imposed ads will give you your due diligence. But when you, like many, many others, shove these ads in every way onto the player, it's less likely that people will return to the game at all.

Most ads I've ever seen in a game. Will interrupt you playing every 5-10 seconds to force you to watch a 30sec - 1 min ad. It says tap to continue like you have an option to continue playing without watching the ads but it will play an ad anyways, without giving you the reward. Uninstalling even though it's a lot of fun. There are a lot of other games just like this one, fortunately. Not paying $10 for such a simple game just to not have 50 ads in 5 mins of playing. Install for disappointment.

paper.io is a game that is fun and it keeps you entertained. it was creative to use different countries as maps. once you finish countries, you have to steal countries from other players. it is very fun and i suggest this game for anyone! although the game is extremely entertaining, there are too many ads. why do you need a “break time” every three kills? and if you do not want the power up, it gives you an ad. i have to watch a 10 second add every three kills? seriously? please fix this? thanks

I expected lots of ads but even for a mobile game this is ridiculous, like it gets straight up unplayable after a while. The whole "break time" gimmick is soooo unnecessary and removing it would genuinely be a massive improvement. Gameplay itself is quite fun but you can't really enjoy it when there's a bajillion ads in your face all the time. It's games like these that remind me why capitalism is a corrupt system

I enjoy playing this game for the most part. However, they have added a 2 minute clock to the game. The clock takes away from the game. Also, the way they take land away is a problem. It's almost impossible to complete a board before losing other boards. Furthermore, the character moves very slow compared to the computer pieces.

If you get the paid version <5USD, the game is smooth. You still have to watch ads for booster and some bonus skins, but you can have an ad free experience. Prior to upgrading to ad free. The ads were horrible. They were too frequent, too long, and would often freeze and crash the game. I hated the ad version. I'm addicted to the add free version But that's the point in capitalism, right? annoy them with so many ads that they buy the ad free.

the game itself is fun but there are a lot of ads. they put adds in the middle of gameplay which is very annoying but it's bearable. I wish they could take away the self kill feature though. I kill myself way to often especially in tight areas or when I'm trying to get away from someone. I wish you would just unable to kill yourself

Still a lot of fun (I have the paid version to allow respawn faster). But the there are way too many adds that are 30 seconds, click the x and it launches your web browser, shut that down and back to the game for a 5 sec add, hit the x and it launches a 3 sec add. If you never use the specials though, this is a 4 star game.

I love this game, but there is one bug so bad I am giving this a 4. Sometimes, when you die, you are given a choice to continue. You might be like,"HOw iS ThAt usEfUll?" Well, I've been trying to get the 50 kill award, and I usually die. And then, to make it worse, the glitch comes. There is only one way to fix this glitch. TO LEAVE AND JOIN BACK. So I lose my progress. TLDR: It's a pretty good game. Watch out for the lost progress bug.

Ads are harassing and the rules of who wins when you cross another players line is unclear but seems to mostly go the other player's favor. When watching ads for power ups, another life, etc. they don't work a lot of the time. I would occupy most of the country and somehow EVERY SINGLE TIME, I would die before completely getting the entire country. Uninstalling

If 0 stars were an option... The gameplay is great, I love everything about it. But the ads are out of control. Also I purchased a special offer for $4.99 that included a skin, currency, and "no ads". It honestly feels like I've had MORE ads since the purchase. Pretty disappointing.

fun to play, way too many ads, every time it gives me the option to revive I watch the ad and then my screen freezes so I have to close the app and reopen it and don't get the extra life, it can't be my Internet because my internets strength is all the way up, the sensitivety is bad because I drag my finger were I want to go but it just keeps moving forward and sometimes it turns way too fast and makes me run into myself and die. pls recognize my complaints. I'll play it if you fix it.

The game itself is pretty fun and I find myself getting rather competitive there's as many ads as there is play time but anytime I try to watch a video for an extra life it freezes the game and all my hard work and progress is banished. Other than that its smooth, there's numerous blocks or characters to take over as. My goal is to finish a board 100% without dying

This is an amazing game, I fell in love with it the moment I started playing. This so addicting. The only problem is ads, whenever there is break time it always shows an ad even if we don't want to use the power up, and everytime after getting killed or winning it shows an ad which is unnecessary. I would have given a 5 star rating, but the ads made me do a 4 . I request the game developers to take a look at this concern and try to fix it. Thank you.

Its a pretty good game. I like it. But the thing I hate the most is the (1) break time. I find it extremely annoying .(2) The other is the map stuff.. It only gives you three countries while moving from country to country I got close to someone else's possessions and now I continuously have to attack their countries while I still have some left on my side and they're also attacking mine. These are two issues .

I love this game! I love it because it is fun and competitive. One of the only bad things about this game is that there are a fair number of ads. I think that this is because of all the ad breaks in each game. Not only are these annoying, but they are problematic. For example, if there is a long ad break, then the game can start again very suddenly, and I have been eliminated a few times when the game starts too suddenly and I run into something and get eliminated. Idk if I recommend, tho. 6/10

Great game! But there's to many adds! When I play the game,theres an add that interrupts me then someone eliminates me! Even when I don't want an extra live. Please stop the adds and lower them down. ( I mean put less adds) But I recommend this game when your bored! Would of given 5 stars,fix the adds and I'll give 5 stars! And a bug,I wanted to change, my profile picture,but it wouldn't let me change it! (The one next to your username)

Really fun game but the ads are a bit over the top. Ads between games and for rewards is fair, but the ad breaks in the middle of the game are really annoying! They also sometimes hit at the most inconvenient times! I love the team game modes, it's a fun different dynamic but also there's no ad breaks in the middle of play!

Amazing game, absolutely love playing. The adverts can be frustrating sometimes with the constant breaks in between playing,though. However,that isn't the main issue, I've noticed when you are over 60% coverage of the map,the next advert that will play will crash,forcing you to restart the app. It also happens when you want to revive yourself with over 60% coverage the advert will play,but then the app will appear to freeze and not let you tap anything. I'd love to keep playing if this is fixed.

🌸Good game. You unlock skins, play against other players and be the winner of the game. Preety simple, but yet very fun to play when you're board. The only two problems are is that there are too many ads! Second of all, since there's breaks, you have to watch a thirty second ad every six minutes! Needs a tiny bit more improving, but still good. Recommended it.🌸

This game is good in a way... It's relaxing and smooth but there is this problem of ads. I understand that an ad is used to run the game financially but like there is an ad every 30-45 seconds. You die, you get an ad. You are in the battleground and suddenly it is breaktime - you get a chance to get a powerup. Watch a video the get the powerup, say no thanks, still watch an ad. It's starting to be so repetitive and annoying.

Love this game, but the number of ads is ridiculous! It will give you adds every 20 seconds during the game and then another after you end and before you start! They game is hardly playable because of this as the game starts immediately after the add so often, people kill you. Also, after you get to 100%, the game crashes and doesn't load your points. I also got attacked in my world, and it didn't tell me how they attacked or how I can attack them back, so that's irritating. Great idea, though.

Wish I could do 0 stars, Absolutely terrible, way too many ads and power ups and everything. They don't care about the players, it's completely just a cash grab. Nothing like the ads! They make it seem like you can actually get the entire map and do this and that but you can't, it's really bad, also, the game breaks sometimes and you get eliminated for no reason, sometimes losing you lots and lots of work, again, I wish it could be 0 stars! The reason you need WiFi is so they get more ad money!!

This game was really fun to play but after sometime now the app is not opening. I have made a lot of progress but now it's all gone maybe as I was thinking of uninstalling and reinstalling it.. But all my progress will go away so I'm sad.. Please kindly do something about it.. And also when I get the break time and I click on watch ad, the ad doesn't come and I do not get the fever/eagle eye , etc (in-game).. And sometimes when I watch an ad for it another ad pops up... Edit: I uninstalled it.

data.userName: jesus songs stories reading bible and testimony
data.text: When I first started, I thought it was going to be boring. Then when I played the game I was fully addicted to it. When you play the game, to actually get an instant win you need fever which let's you go fast. And you can upgrade the time of fever which helps you to have more time to conquer a big country. Install this game this instant. But I gave it a four because there are countless of ads and even if you press no thank you it gives you an ad.😢 Besides that, GOOD LUCK! 😊

EDIT-New update and was hoping my game would finally work again but it just goes to start screen, half bar at bottom loads & stops there. No way to contact developers. Original-A couple weeks ago I tried to play and the game wouldn't work so I Uninstalled, reinstalled and all my progress was lost. We're back to that exact problem again. I worked hard to get all my pieces but won't do it again. I've been playing for a good while and really enjoy it but the ads are ridiculous.

Amazing app, very time killing and I enjoy playing this alot. Two things that are annoying is the amount of ads its too many even having a break time, you deny the offer and it gives you an ad anyways very stupid and annoying and second thing im just normally building up my area until I randomly die when nobody has touched me, do you die if you touch your own line or something because it keeps killing me randomly and I find it very annoying. Overall, great though 👍

This game is nice and cool and so unique I love playing this game and recommend it to you guys however I always really want something but I HAVE to pay for it,there are too many ads. There are annoying glitches and I have to delete that tab and reload it again,it mostly happens with ads. I have played this for a year.It is really boring now, to many ads and glitches, and it makes me annoyed to why to many people just take my contries then again, WAY TOO MANY ADS. I have to pay all the time☹️.bad

I played this game every day, for hours! I got on this morning and saw I had lost nearly 1,000 gems (tough to acquire) and approx 4 mil coins. My skin and name were both changed, too. I can't imagine why my screen name would be changed from "VoteForTRUMP!" back to "FingerTip KILLA"... There's been too many glitches lately, like running through an opponents line and then getting killed by that opponent somehow and watching ads but not getting the reward for it, very often. Uninstalled! 🖕🤠🖕
